sn51.3:1.1: “Mendicants, when these four bases of psychic power are developed and cultivated they are noble and emancipating, and bring one who practices them to the complete ending of suffering.
sn51.3:1.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm …
sn51.3:1.7: When these four bases of psychic power are developed and cultivated they are noble and emancipating, and bring one who practices them to the complete ending of suffering.”
